comment.author: 14247749@N00
comment._content: Thank you for posting this image. We have added it to our article about Antebellum Women in NCpedia, a free, online encyclopedia about North Carolina. ncpedia.org/history/1776-1860/antebellum-women. Thank you again, Michelle Underhill Digital Projects Librarian
comment.authorname: Government & Heritage Library, State Library of NC
